name: Scary Rollercoaster Theme Park Rush - Tilt Strategy Game
name_original: Scary Rollercoaster Theme Park Rush - Tilt Strategy Game
description:
This game is going to be the ride of your life!

Take the coaster to move up the tracks by tilting sideways.

Avoid and overcome obstacles to clear the game!
Don’t go too far on edges or you might fall!

FEATURES++
-Easy but challenging gameplay
-Easy tilt controls
